wikitext.*:
'''''harn''''' is a [[Sindarin]] adjective with two meanings:

# ''southern'' ([[OS]] ''k<sup>h</sup>arna'', [[CE]] ''k<sup>hj</sup>arnâ'')
# ''wounded'' ([[OS]] ''same as above'')

It is also the soft mutation of ''[[sarn]]'' "stone".
